Wifi-Hacker-course.title: Certified WiFi Pentesting 101 (Deauth, Spam, and Captive Portal)
Wifi-Hacker-course.Short Description: Join us for a practical workshop on WiFi Hacking & Pentesting!
Wifi-Hacker-course.Description: Master the art of WiFi hacking in this beginner-friendly  workshop. You'll learn real-world techniques such as Deauthentication attacks, WiFi spam, Evil Twin attacks, and Captive Portal exploitation. This hands-on course is designed for students, cybersecurity enthusiasts, and ethical hackers looking to enhance their wireless pentesting skills. All participants will receive a soft copy of the certificate, course toolkit, and training materials.
What you'll learn: Basics of WiFi Communication and Encryption
How to Set Up Kali Linux for WiFi Pentesting
Creating Captive Portals for Credential Harvesting
Evil Twin Attack Setup and Execution
How to Stay Anonymous During Attacks
Ethical Usage and Legal Boundaries of Wireless Hacking
